text: Va kasone, ki dar ʙorai dini Alloh ʙo huccathoi ʙotil ʙo Muhammad sallallohu alajhi va sallam cidol mekunand, to pesi imoni mardumro ʙigirand, pas az on ki guruhe az mardumi oqilu dono da'vati uro icoʙat kardaand, nazdi Parvardigorason huccathojason nociz va ʙotil ast. Bar onhost xasmi Alloh dar dunjo va niz ʙar onhost azoʙi saxt dar oxirat. Va on otasi duzax ast
